title: Ashley Graham slips baby bump into fiery red PVC dress as she channels Jessica Rabbit for Halloween
text:
She's a bombshell in her own right.

But Ashley Graham took inspiration from another superstar for her Halloween costume on Saturday night.

The 31-year-old beauty showcased her spitting resemblance of the fictional sex symbol, Jessica Rabbit, for a party at Hyde in West Hollywood.

Scroll down for video

Mama's night out: Ashley Graham slipped her baby bump into a red PVC dress to channel the fictional sex symbol, Jessica Rabbit, for a Halloween party at Hyde in West Hollywood on Saturday night

Ashley slipped herself and her burgeoning baby bump into a form-fitting red PVC dress.

Her frock was full length and featured a strapless sweetheart design on the top with a host of sparkling jewels.

The beauty accessorised her look with Jessica's signature purple gloves and shared a sultry video for her fans.

Well-fitted: Her frock was full length and featured a strapless love heart design on the top

Sexy: 'I'm not bad, I'm just drawn that way,' she said in a sexy tone

Hourglass: Jessica Rabbit is a fictional sex-symbol cartoon character with a large bust and very tiny waist

'I'm not bad, I'm just drawn that way,' she said in a sexy tone.

Ashley got rid of her brunette tresses in exchange for a fiery red wig that was styled by celebrity hair stylist, Justine Marjan.

Her glam was done by Ash K Holm and consisted of purple eye-shadow, contoured cheekbones and a bold red pout on her lips.

It takes a village: The beauty accessorised her look with Jessica's signature purple gloves and shared a sultry video for her fans

And while Ashley sure looked the part, it took a village to get her dressed, with Justin sharing a hilarious video struggling to pull up her gloves.

'One of your nails is going to fall off,' she joked.

Ashley's husband, Justin Ervin, was also seen heading to the A-list party with the mom-to-be.

Justin rocked a blue tie-dye shirt that had been cut out and teamed it with a bandanna and white sunglasses, perhaps dressing up as Randy Savage.

Dressed up: Ashley's husband, Justin Ervin, was also seen heading to the A-list party with the mom-to-be. Justin rocked a blue tie-dye shirt that had been cut out and teamed it with a bandanna and white sunglasses, perhaps dressing up as Randy Savage

New hair: Ashley got rid of her brunette tresses in exchange for a fiery red wig that was styled by celebrity hair stylist, Justine Marjan

The pair are excitedly awaiting their first child after announcing their pregnancy on their ninth wedding anniversary back in August.

Ashley has been open about her pregnancy and has regularly shared naked snaps of her body as she goes through each trimester.

'Getting bigger and bigger and trying to embrace my new body everyday. It's a journey and I'm so thankful to have such a supportive community,' she recently wrote on her Instagram.
description: Ashley Graham slipped her baby bump into a red PVC dress to channel the fictional sex symbol, Jessica Rabbit, for a Halloween party at Hyde in West Hollywood on Saturday night.
